name: Tales From the Herd: Prologue
description:
Experience the prologue to my upcoming life simulation game where you journey out into a mysterious, and perhaps familiar pony inhabited village. The prologue introduces you to some of the core mechanics, including an immersive and divergent conversation system, plus the ability to create your own pony!

I am solo developing this project, so it may take quite a bit of time. But be sure to follow the official Twitter for updates, or contact me at herdtales@gmail.com for comments and / or bug reporting.

And thank you for checking the project out!
